  • Method Details

    • preLoad

      public SELF preLoad(Consumer<C> preLoad)
      Description copied from interface: SerializerBuilder
      Adds a preload middleware to the serializer. This is run just before data is loaded from disk into the config. This can be used to migrate old config data to a new format.
      Specified by:
      preLoad in interface SerializerBuilder<SELF extends SerializerBuilder<SELF,S,C>,S extends Serializer<?,C>,C>
      Parameters:
      preLoad - The consumer for the preload middleware
      Returns:
      The builder for chaining
      See Also:
      • Serializer

    • preWrite

      public SELF preWrite(Consumer<C> preWrite)
      Description copied from interface: SerializerBuilder
      Adds a prewrite middleware to the serializer. This is run just before data is saved to disk after it has been read from the config.
      Specified by:
      preWrite in interface SerializerBuilder<SELF extends SerializerBuilder<SELF,S,C>,S extends Serializer<?,C>,C>
      Parameters:
      preWrite - The consumer for the prewrite middleware
      Returns:
      The builder for chaining
